summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackThe Kiehl's Since 1851 Ultra Facial Oil-Free Toner is a gentle toner for oily skin and normal skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsGently removes residue, dirt and oil without stripping skin of moistureHelps balance and refresh skinVisibly reduces excess oil for fresher, healthier-looking skinTested for safety and gentlenesspH-balanced, alcohol-freeFor normal to oily skinKey IngredientsGlacial Glycoprotein: originally sourced from Antarctic sea glaciers; helps to deeply hydrate and maintain skin's moisture balanceDesert Plant Extract: has roots that contain high concentrations of potassium which is known to provide immediate and lasting hydration for dry skinItem 2536669How To UseAfter cleansing, moisten a cotton pad with toner and apply to faceAvoid the immediate eye areaIngredientsAqua/Water, Glycerin, Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Triethanolamine, Citric Acid, Imperata Cylindrica Root Extract, Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cucumis Sativus Juice/Cucumber Fruit Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Carbomer.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing, moisten a cotton pad with toner and apply to faceAvoid the immediate eye area

reviews.headline: Smells weird
reviews.comments: If you are sensitive to scents. Not sure which ingredient smells off putting but it triggered a headache. Smells chemically/nasty.

reviews.headline: Simple yet effective
reviews.comments:
This toners product list is clean and it is a simple toner that helps to balance out the skin barrier.
Nothing too special, but it is great to add hydrating toners especially if you are using drying toners.

reviews.headline: It's ok , just started using it
Doesnt really do the job
reviews.comments: I am a super oily person, so toners are a huge deal to me i decided to try out a different toner other then my lush tea tree toner, and this one caught my eye but it doesnt keep me mate throughout the day im constantly blotting my face throughout the day with this toner maybe im just too oily for it but doesnt do its job :/

reviews.headline: not for dry skin
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive, acne prone skin that tends to lean dry, and I had used the clean & clear facial toner prior. I thought this would be a nice step up but it ended up being way too harsh for me. it dried out my skin way more than the clean & clear and left it looking and feeling more dull and dehydrated.

reviews.headline: Amazing and gentle!
reviews.comments: This toner is super gentle and lightweight, it leaves my face feeling so clean morning and night. It works great for removing the excess oil on my forehead! Please please please never discontinue this toner! It's a life saver!

reviews.headline: Great for oily/sensitive skin!
reviews.comments: I love this toner! It has no alcohol or fragrance which is perfect for my skin! It's non irritating and it removes excess oil very easily. I always feel fresh and clean after using this toner. I will always keep buying this!!

reviews.headline: Not my favorite
reviews.comments: I don't really like this toner. It leaves my face feeling sticky after I use it.

reviews.headline: Great hydrating toner
reviews.comments: I was looking for a toner that provided hydration not exfoliation. I use products with AHAs/BHAs in other steps of my routine, but using an exfoliating toner twice a day was getting to be too much. I was surprised when a search of toner on the Ulta website came up with this Kiehl's toner. Not only was it exactly what I was looking for, it was also very reasonably priced. It does a great job of hydrating.

reviews.headline: Holy grail toner for hydration!
reviews.comments:
I have combination skin, leaning towards more oily in the summer.
Toners are all made for different reasons, this one specifically is made for hydration and helping other products you put on settle deeper into the skin. This is not ment to help with acne. I first double cleanse (cerva   Fw and cerva micellar water), then I use this toner, serum, this toner, moisturizer. I keep to a simple routine. If I'm more oily, before I put this toner on, I will use a toner that cleanses oily skin and then use this toner after. A lot of issues stem from having not enough moister or too much moisture. This product ingredient list is great and shouldn't cause irritation. I felt no kind of tingling or irritation for the month I've been using it.

reviews.headline: Doesn't Dry Me Out
reviews.comments: I have combination skin (oily in my t zone and chin area and dry cheeks and forehead) and it is very sensitive and acne prone, especially in my chin area. I used to use the Mario Badesco Rose mist as a toner along with the acne face wash and the A.H.A. Ceramide moisturizer by Mario Badesco. It wasn't doing anything for my acne, wasn't making it better or worse, so I decided to switch to a Kiehl's regimen. This toner doesn't dry my skin out after cleansing and after I'm done, there's always particulates on the cotton pad. It makes me feel like it's doing something. I love that it's oil free, as I am already oily enough. I have noticed that my skin seems more even and doesn't get as oily throughout the day. You get a good amount for the price and I've been using it for 3 weeks and it seems like I haven't made a dent in it, there's still plenty of product in there. The only downside is that it arrived to me broken, the little hinged cap on the top was broken off and a bit of it was broken off. Luckily, it's still usable, the part that clicks in to the spout was still intact. Overall, I'm enjoying this toner, skin feels soft and clean after using it.

reviews.headline: Really wanted to love this products....just not for me :(
reviews.comments: After doing a lot of research about different toners I thought I had found a winner when I came across this. And an even better perk was the quantity you get for the price. But after using it for a week I noticed my skin was actually producing more oil. It might work for others but it just didn't for me. Looks like it's back to the drawing board!

reviews.headline: My favorite toner
reviews.comments: I apply this after washing my face and befor moisturizing. It never dries my skin or makes it greasy. It just gently cleanses

reviews.headline: Best Toner I've used
reviews.comments: This toner is so gentle, yet it works so well getting leftover makeup off that my cleanser might have missed. HIGHLY RECOMMEND

reviews.headline: I BROKE OUT
reviews.comments: I am very acne prone & have combination skin. I broke out so bad within a week of use!

reviews.headline: Gentle but effective
reviews.comments: I have oily skin and love this. I feel like my face looks smoother and brighter

reviews.headline: I love this product!
reviews.comments: I have a sensitive skin. But I can use it!

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: It is really helpful if you are trying to get rid of acne.

properties.name: Pros

values.label: evens out skins discoloration due cold weather
leaves skin feeling fresh and clean

display_values: evens out skins discoloration due cold weather
leaves skin feeling fresh and clean

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have oily but dehydrated skin and have always found products that target oily skin to be a little over drying. I have faithfully used Kiehl's products for over 5 years and have loved all of them, but I've been waiting for a collection that targets dehydrated skin without adding oil, or oily skin without over drying. I'm so happy this collection is finally here!

I bought both the Ultra Facial Oil-Free Cleanser and Toner, and after using them for only 3 days now, I can already see an improvement in my skin. This new collection really cleans your skin without any drying effects. In fact, it actually locks moisture in! After only 3 days, my skin feels much softer and I've noticed that my skin is much less oily.

I highly recommend the new Ultra Facial Oil-Free product line to anyone with oily, dehydrated skin. I'm sure other skin types would benefit as well.

Thank you Kiehl's for this wonderful product line!
faceoff_positive.headline: Finally!

faceoff_negative.comments: This is great for oil control, but it doesn't help when it comes to acne control. I was looking for something a little more gentle than regular acne treatment to help keep the zits at bay, but this isn't helping. Just OK for me, I will need to get something stronger
faceoff_negative.headline: OK, not what I was looking for
